The main reason for the collapse of Joshimath: –
1) Mountains with glaciers.
2) Rapid flow of Alaknanda river.
3) Construction work in excess of capacity.
4) Lack of good drainage system.
5) Lack of sewer system.
6) Landslides due to continuous cutting of forests.
7) Blasting of mountains for big projects.
